Eric Schmidt said that he would focus on external issues, such as "deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships," while Page would merge Google's technology and business vision. On a conference call, Eric Schmidt said in his new job he will focus more on external issues, working with customers, partners and government. "I believe Larry is ready," Eric Schmidt said. His ideas are very interesting and clever and it's time for him to have a shot at running this. A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. While Michael Vick didn't make the Super Bowl, and New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady is the likely MVP, Michael Vick 's touchdowns this season won back scores of fans. TrackBack TrackBack
